messages.subject: Re: No time/motivation for podcast
messages.msgSnippet: was just about to e-mail you and see if you were okay. :-) I understand how hectic life can be. If anyone wants to pick up the torch, that would be great.
messages.messageBody:
was just about to e-mail you and see if you were okay. :-) I
understand how hectic life can be.

If anyone wants to pick up the torch, that would be great. We're
already at the third edition of Unschooling Voices and the 4th will
be out on October 1st. If someone decided to do the podcast, let me
know. :-)

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (8), Shawna (11) & Cimion (13)
Unschooling Voices - add your voice!
http://www.foreverparents.com/UnschoolingVoices.html








--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, queana7@... wrote:
>
>
>
> I just wanted to let everyone know that I cannot keep this project
going! I just don't have the time or energy to do it right now. If
someone has the interest to partner with the blog carnival, or start
up a podcast, I really encourage you to do it! I started this one
because I was wishing there was one and there wasn't. It's at least
a couple hours per podcast to put together, but for someone that
isn't working full time as I am, it would not be too much of a
commitment.
>
> Thanks a lot for the encouragement, and the positive comments from
everyone who listened! I hope that someone will take the idea and
run with it!
>
> ~Q~
> aka Sarah

messages.subject: re:No time/motivation for podcast
messages.msgSnippet: Q, Thank You, for all the effort you put into the podcast. Laura Drew Unschoolingmaine.com I just  wanted to let everyone know that I cannot keep this project
messages.messageBody:
Q, Thank You, for all the effort you put into the podcast.


Laura Drew
Unschoolingmaine.com

I just wanted to let everyone know that I cannot keep this project going! I
just don't have the time or energy to do it right now. If someone has the
interest to partner with the blog carnival, or start up a podcast, I really
encourage you to do it! I started this one because I was wishing there was one
and there wasn't. It's at least a couple hours per podcast to put together, but
for someone that isn't working full time as I am, it would not be too much
of a commitment.

Thanks a lot for the encouragement, and the positive comments from everyone
who listened! I hope that someone will take the idea and run with it!

~Q~
aka Sarah






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: No time/motivation for podcast
messages.msgSnippet: I just wanted to let everyone know that I cannot keep this project going!  I just don t have the time or energy to do it right now.  If someone has the
messages.messageBody:
I just wanted to let everyone know that I cannot keep this project going! I just don't have the time or energy to do it right now. If someone has the interest to partner with the blog carnival, or start up a podcast, I really encourage you to do it! I started this one because I was wishing there was one and there wasn't. It's at least a couple hours per podcast to put together, but for someone that isn't working full time as I am, it would not be too much of a commitment.

Thanks a lot for the encouragement, and the positive comments from everyone who listened! I hope that someone will take the idea and run with it!

~Q~
aka Sarah
